fields.name: Smite (Cost ?%x2/?%x2):
fields.value: Can only be used when you are using Eldritch Blast OR Crusade. You may expend as much score as you wish from the Mage Energy Pool to add to your Attack Score. Every 2% spent from the Energy Pool will correspond to a 1% increase in your Attack Score.

fields.name: Crusade (Cost 110%/65%):
fields.value: Target a player. You will attack the initial target with your Attack Power and Rampage with 2/3rds of the Attack Score used against the initial target.

fields.name: Banishment (Cost 100%/70%):
fields.value: Target a player who is not yourself. They will be banished for the Night, which both roleblocks them and causes ALL abilities used on them to fail.
